General.Name: Outback Goldfields Corp
General.Description: Outback Goldfields Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties. The company explores for gold. It holds interests in four gold projects, which include the Yeungroon, Glenfine, Ballarat West, and Silver Spoon projects located in the Fosterville gold district in Victoria, Australia, as well as has 100% interests in the Gossan and SBS properties situated in the Spences Gold Belt in British Columbia, Canada. The company was formerly known as Skarb Exploration Corp. and changed its name to Outback Goldfields Corp. in December 2020. Outback Goldfields Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1090 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3V7
